actions.name: AssociateCertificate
actions.description: Grants permission to associate an AWS Certificate Manager (ACM) Amazon Resource Name (ARN) with AWS Elemental MediaConvert

actions.name: CancelJob
actions.description: Grants permission to cancel an AWS Elemental MediaConvert job that is waiting in queue

actions.name: CreateJob
actions.description: Grants permission to create and submit an AWS Elemental MediaConvert job

actions.name: CreateJobTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to create an AWS Elemental MediaConvert custom job template

actions.name: CreatePreset
actions.description: Grants permission to create an AWS Elemental MediaConvert custom output preset

actions.name: CreateQueue
actions.description: Grants permission to create an AWS Elemental MediaConvert job queue

actions.name: DeleteJobTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an AWS Elemental MediaConvert custom job template

actions.name: DeletePolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an AWS Elemental MediaConvert policy

actions.name: DeletePreset
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an AWS Elemental MediaConvert custom output preset

actions.name: DeleteQueue
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an AWS Elemental MediaConvert job queue

actions.name: DescribeEndpoints
actions.description: Grants permission to subscribe to the AWS Elemental MediaConvert service, by sending a request for an account-specific endpoint. All transcoding requests must be sent to the endpoint that the service returns

actions.name: DisassociateCertificate
actions.description: Grants permission to remove an association between the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an AWS Certificate Manager (ACM) certificate and an AWS Elemental MediaConvert resource

actions.name: GetJob
actions.description: Grants permission to get an AWS Elemental MediaConvert job

actions.name: GetJobTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to get an AWS Elemental MediaConvert job template

actions.name: GetPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to get an AWS Elemental MediaConvert policy

actions.name: GetPreset
actions.description: Grants permission to get an AWS Elemental MediaConvert output preset

actions.name: GetQueue
actions.description: Grants permission to get an AWS Elemental MediaConvert job queue

actions.name: ListJobTemplates
actions.description: Grants permission to list AWS Elemental MediaConvert job templates

actions.name: ListJobs
actions.description: Grants permission to list AWS Elemental MediaConvert jobs

actions.name: ListPresets
actions.description: Grants permission to list AWS Elemental MediaConvert output presets

actions.name: ListQueues
actions.description: Grants permission to list AWS Elemental MediaConvert job queues

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the tags for a MediaConvert queue, preset, or job template

actions.name: ListVersions
actions.description: Grants permission to list AWS Elemental MediaConvert job engine versions

actions.name: PutPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to put an AWS Elemental MediaConvert policy

actions.name: SearchJobs
actions.description: Grants permission to search AWS Elemental MediaConvert jobs

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to add tags to a MediaConvert queue, preset, or job template

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove tags from a MediaConvert queue, preset, or job template

actions.name: UpdateJobTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to update an AWS Elemental MediaConvert custom job template

actions.name: UpdatePreset
actions.description: Grants permission to update an AWS Elemental MediaConvert custom output preset

actions.name: UpdateQueue
actions.description: Grants permission to update an AWS Elemental MediaConvert job queue
